jobs_description.title: Data Science & Data Analyst
jobs_description.description: In this project, I was the Lead of the Data Analytics area, where I coordinated a team of 7 members specialized in data analysis. My main responsibilities included defining the scope of the analyses, structuring the data pipeline, and ensuring the accuracy of the insights generated. Additionally, I worked closely with other teams to integrate analytical solutions into decision-making processes.
list: Data cleaning and transformation to improve data quality and reliability.
Development of machine learning models to optimize business strategies.
Analysis of campaign results to identify trends and actionable insights.
Deployment of solutions using Streamlit to make data accessible to stakeholders.

projects.title: Analysis and Consulting for Gastronomic Investment
projects.description: The main objective of this project is to simulate a business consulting firm specialized in analyzing the profitability and feasibility of gastronomic investments. We developed a data-driven model that allows investors to evaluate potential restaurant locations, predict profitability, and optimize resource allocation. The project integrates data extraction, cleaning, and predictive modeling techniques to provide valuable insights for decision-making.

projects.title: Homicide Analysis in Traffic Accidents in Buenos Aires
projects.description: In this project, I took on the role of Data Analyst to analyze the impact of traffic accidents resulting in fatalities in Buenos Aires. The objective was to identify patterns, risk factors, and high-incident areas to support public policies and accident prevention strategies. I processed large datasets, created interactive Power BI dashboards, and provided data-driven recommendations for improving road safety.

projects.title: MLOps Project for Steam
projects.description: In this project, I took on the role of an MLOps Engineer for the Steam gaming platform. The objective was to deploy a recommendation system capable of suggesting games based on user preferences and behavior. The system was developed using Python and FastAPI, implementing automated pipelines for data ingestion, model training, and deployment. The project also included monitoring and continuous integration processes to ensure optimal performance and scalability.

contributions.title: Teaching Assistant
contributions.description: I had the privilege of being chosen as a Teaching Assistant, where I guided students in their learning process in the field of data science. My responsibilities included mentoring, resolving technical doubts, and assisting in project evaluations. This experience allowed me to strengthen my communication skills and reinforce my knowledge by teaching others.
